prompts: Create a mysterious Pokemon with a unique shape that represents a letter from the alphabet.
Design a dark-type Pokemon inspired by ancient symbols and cryptic messages.
Imagine an abstract creature with swirling forms and a focus on psychic abilities.
Generate a ghostly Pokemon that embodies the essence of forgotten languages and knowledge.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like an enigma, with a sleek design and shadowy colors.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a glyph, with an emphasis on psychic energy and intelligence.
Give me a minimalistic Pokemon that features a single eye and represents untranslatable concepts.
